formalpara.title: Movie 2. Worms expressing the fluorescent Ca2+ biosensor D3cpv in the intestine executing the defecation motor program.
formalpara.para: FRET analysis was used to create a pseudocolor ratio map from time series of single excitation dual emission fluorescent images obtained from unrestrained worm moving normally on agar plates seeded with bacteria. Blue, low Ca2+; red, high Ca2+.
